Title: Relates to permitting a driver to not have a hand on the steering mechanism of a vehicle while a driving automation system is engaged
Summary: Relates to permitting a driver to not have a hand on the steering mechanism of a vehicle while a driving automation system is engaged.
LawCode: Amd ยง1226, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting a driver to not have a hand on the steering mechanism of a vehicle while a driving automation system is engaged
